sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import upcomingWorkoutsIcon from "../assets/icons/upcoming-workouts-dash.png"; import Modal from "react-bootstrap/Modal"; const BookAWorkout = () => { const [user, setUser] = useState(null); useEffect(() => { const email = sessionStorage.getItem("email"); if (email) { (async () => { try { const { data } = await axios.get(`/api/users?email=${email}`); setUser(data); } catch (err) { console.log("err fetching user==>", err); } })(); } }, []); const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); return (

Book a workout

X upcoming workouts!
Sunday, March 14th

Time: 9:00 AM to 10:00 AM
Location: Rocky Mountain Christian Church
Address: 5860 Majestic St, Frederick, CO 80504

Monday, March 15th

Time: 9:00 AM to 10:00 AM
Location: Rocky Mountain Christian Church
Address: 5860 Majestic St, Frederick, CO 80504

Tuesday, March 16th

Time: 9:00 AM to 10:00 AM
Location: Rocky Mountain Christian Church
Address: 5860 Majestic St, Frederick, CO 80504

Wednesday, March 17th

Time: 9:00 AM to 10:00 AM
Location: Rocky Mountain Christian Church
Address: 5860 Majestic St, Frederick, CO 80504

Thursday, March 18th

Time: 9:00 AM to 10:00 AM
Location: Rocky Mountain Christian Church
Address: 5860 Majestic St, Frederick, CO 80504

Friday, March 19th

Time: 9:00 AM to 10:00 AM
Location: Rocky Mountain Christian Church
Address: 5860 Majestic St, Frederick, CO 80504

Saturday, March 20th

Time: 9:00 AM to 10:00 AM
Location: Rocky Mountain Christian Church
Address: 5860 Majestic St, Frederick, CO 80504

Are you sure you want to book this workout?
{user ? (

Name: {user.name}

Email: {user.email}

) : ( "" )}
); }; export default BookAWorkout;
